text: Vale az mijoni onon rosixoni dar ilm [ulamoi jahud] va mu'minon [ja'ne onon, ki] ʙa on ci ʙar tu nozil şudaast va on ci ki peş az tu nozil şudaast, imon meovarand va [hamcunin] namozguzoronu zakotdihandagon va imonovarandagon ʙa Alloh taolo va rūzi ʙozpasin, ʙa [hamai] inho podoşi ʙuzurge xohem dod
